import React from 'react'; import { BrowserRouter as Router } from 'react-router-dom'; import { MDBNavbar, MDBNavbarBrand, MDBNavbarNav, MDBNavItem, MDBNavLink, MDBNavbarToggler, MDBCollapse, MDBMask, MDBRow, MDBCol, MDBBtn, MDBView, MDBContainer, MDBAnimation, } from 'mdbreact'; import "../styles/ParallaxIntro.css" import mepic from "../images /me.jpeg" import AboutModel from "./About" class ParallaxIntro extends React.Component { state = { collapsed: false }; toggleCollapse = collapseID => () => { this.setState(prevState => ({ collapseID: (prevState.collapseID !== collapseID ? collapseID : '') })); } toggleSingleCollapse = collapseId => { this.setState({ ...this.state, [collapseId]: !this.state[collapseId] }); } componentDidMount() { document.querySelector('nav').style.height = '65px'; } componentWillUnmount() { document.querySelector('nav').style.height = 'auto'; } render() { const navStyle = { marginTop: '1rem' }; const overlay = (
); const { collapsed } = this.state; return (
{/* Chuck's Site */} this.toggleSingleCollapse('collapse1')} /> Home About Contact Me Projects {/*
*/} {collapsed && overlay}

Charles Harper

Professional Web Developer And Entrepreneur

); } } export default ParallaxIntro;
